clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: your User Content may be deleted at any time without prior notice to you

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: SpaceHey.com may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: <li>harass or interfere with any other user’s use and enjoyment of the Site

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Germany)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Germany and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Stuttgart, Germany.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.
clauses.clause_text: If you provide SpaceHey.com with any feedback or suggestions regarding the Site, you hereby assign to SpaceHey.com all rights in such Feedback and agree that SpaceHey.com shall have the right to use and fully exploit such Feedback and related information in any manner it believes appropriate. SpaceHey.com will treat any Feedback you provide to SpaceHey.com as non-confidential and non-proprietary.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: You are warned of the potential consequences related to third-party access
clauses.description: This is different from disclaiming liability for external links, which is handled by the "This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites" case.
clauses.clause_text: This means that in addition to this privacy policy, you are bound by the privacy policy of any third party content provider that the user may have embedded in their profile.

case.text: You are warned of the potential consequences related to third-party access

clauses.title: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
